response: Arduino ek electronic device hai jo humein help karta hai circuits banane mein. Yeh ek microcontroller board hai jo humein coding ke through control karne ki suvidha deta hai. Isse hum projects jaise robots, sensors, lights, etc. bana sakte hain. Toh, Arduino khud nahi hai, par yeh ek madadgar tool hai jo humein technology mein madad karta hai!
